ModMetaData.name: Soul Weaver
ModMetaData.author: ValandorShadowbyte
ModMetaData.description:
Soul Weaver adds a new forbidden psycasting path to RimWorld that focuses on the dark art of consciousness transfer.
Soulweavers are masters of body-hopping who can: • Possess enemy bodies to turn them against their allies • Swap consciousness with allies to escape death • Create vessels to house their soul when their current body becomes damaged • Achieve immortality through continuous soul transfer
These forbidden psycasters are feared for their ability to never truly die, always finding a new host when their current vessel fails them. The Soul Weaver path offers unique gameplay mechanics centered around consciousness manipulation and body possession.
Requires Vanilla Psycasts Expanded to function.
